articles.author: Nicole McCain
articles.title: Covid-19: 12 979 new cases, deaths rise by 126 - News24
articles.description: South Africa recorded 12 979 new Covid-19 cases, increasing the total number of laboratory-confirmed cases to 3 446 532.
articles.content:
• South Africa recorded 12 979 new Covid-19 cases.
  • The country also recorded 126 new deaths, taking the death toll to 91 061.
  • KwaZulu-Natal recorded the most new infections.
